trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Clear-Variable
trans-unit.target: Clear-Variable

trans-unit.source: Clear-Variable
trans-unit.target: Clear-Variable

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Deletes the value of a variable.
trans-unit.target: 刪除變數的值。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Clear-Variable** cmdlet deletes the data stored in a variable, but it does not delete the variable.
trans-unit.target: **Clear-variable** cmdlet 會刪除儲存在變數中的資料，但不會刪除變數。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the variable is NULL (empty).
trans-unit.target: 因此，變數的值是 NULL (空白)。

trans-unit.source: If the variable has a specified data or object type, this cmdlet preserves the type of the object stored in the variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數具有指定的資料或物件型別，這個指令程式會保留儲存在變數中的物件型別。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Remove the value of global variables that begin with a search string
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 移除搜尋字串的開頭的全域變數的值

trans-unit.source: This command removes the value of global variables that have names that begin with my.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會移除名稱開頭的全域變數的值我。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Clear a variable in a child scope but not the parent scope
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 清除子範圍，但父範圍中的變數

trans-unit.source: These commands demonstrate that clearing a variable in a child scope does not clear the value in the parent scope.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令示範清除子系範圍中的變數不會清除父系範圍中的值。

trans-unit.source: The first command sets the value of the variable $A to 3.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令會將變數 $A 值設為 3。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the invoke operator (&) to run the **Clear-Variable** command in a new scope.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令使用叫用運算子 (&) 來執行 **Clear-variable** 命令中新的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The variable is cleared in the child scope (although it did not exist), but it is not cleared in the local scope.
trans-unit.target: 子系範圍內的變數會被清除 (雖然它不存在)，但本機範圍內的變數不會被清除。

trans-unit.source: The third command, which gets the value of $A, shows that the value 3 is unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 第三個命令會取得 $A 的值，會顯示 3 這個值是不會受到影響。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Delete the value of the specified variable
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 刪除指定的變數的值

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the value of the variable named Processes.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會刪除名為處理程序的變數的值。

trans-unit.source: After the cmdlet completes the operation, the variable named Processes still exists, but the value is null.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet 完成作業之後，名為處理程序的變數仍然存在，但此值為 null。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of items that this cmdlet omits in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在作業中指定這個指令程式會省略的項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *名稱* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 輸入名稱元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the cmdlet clears a variable even if it is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式會清除變數，即使它是唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Even using the *Force* parameter, the cmdlet cannot clear constants.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 *Force* 參數，cmdlet 仍然無法清除常數。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of items that this cmdlet includes in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定此指令程式包含在作業中的項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Name* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *名稱* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a name element or pattern, such as s*.
trans-unit.target: 輸入名稱元素或模式，例如 s *。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the variable to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 指定要清除之變數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required, but the parameter name, Name, is optional.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是必要，參數名稱，但名稱是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the item with which you are working.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表您正在使用之項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -Scope
trans-unit.target: 範圍

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scope in which this alias is valid.
trans-unit.target: 指定別名的有效範圍。

trans-unit.source: The acceptable values for this parameter are:
trans-unit.target: 此參數接受的值包括：

trans-unit.source: Global
trans-unit.target: 全域

trans-unit.source: Local
trans-unit.target: 本機

trans-unit.source: Script
trans-unit.target: 指令碼

trans-unit.source: You can also use a number relative to the current scope (0 through the number of scopes, where 0 is the current scope and 1 is its parent).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用數字相對於目前範圍 (0 至範圍，其中 0 為目前的範圍，1 為其父系數目)。

trans-unit.source: Local is the default.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為本機。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Scopes.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Scopes。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線將物件傳送至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.PSVariable
trans-unit.target: 無或 System.Management.Automation.PSVariable

trans-unit.source: When you use the *PassThru* parameter, this cmdlet generates a **System.Management.Automation.PSVariable** object representing the cleared variable.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 *PassThru* 參數，此 cmdlet 會產生 **System.Management.Automation.PSVariable** 物件，代表已清除的變數。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To delete a variable, along with its value, use the Remove-Variable or Remove-Item cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的變數，其值，以及使用 Remove-variable 或 Remove-item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not delete the values of variables that are set as constants or owned by the system, even if you use the *Force* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式不會刪除已設為常數或系統，所擁有的變數的值，即使您使用 *Force* 參數。

trans-unit.source: If the variable that you are clearing does not exist, the cmdlet has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您清除的變數不存在，Cmdlet 不會有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: It does not create a variable with a null value.
trans-unit.target: 它不會建立具有 null 值的變數。

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Clear-Variable** by its built-in alias, clv.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考 **Clear-variable** 內建的別名，clv。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Get-Variable

trans-unit.source: New-Variable
trans-unit.target: New-Variable

trans-unit.target: Remove-Variable

trans-unit.target: Set-Variable
